channel.title: Geolocation on Edge Compute Live
channel.description: Recent content in Geolocation on Edge Compute Live

item.title: Cookie Geolocation
item.description: Implements an EdgeWorker to add geolocation data to a cookie in the HTTP response. This cookie returns location information about the client where the request originates, including a lookup from custom data.

item.title: Geolocation
item.description: This example implements a microservice GEO-Location API call that returns location information about the client where the request originates.

item.title: Store Locator
item.description:
Implements a microservice store locator API call that returns the two stores nearest to the provided latitude and longitude.

Note: Latitude and Longitude values are hardcoded for demo purposes.

item.title: Traffic Allow
item.description: Implements an allow list depending on the geographic locale of the end user. If the user is arriving from United States embargoed countries, a 403 deny will occur.
